text: Petar Krumov (born 18 September 1941) is a Bulgarian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman 87 kg at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Bulgaria Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Sofia
title: Petar Krumov (wrestler)
